signals.NULL_PACKET: Input payload is missing or empty entirely.
signals.ZERO_VOLATILITY_ANOMALY: IV or Volatility is exactly 0.0 while market is OPEN.
signals.PRICE_SPIKE_ANOMALY: Price changed > X% since last known (flash move).
signals.NEGATIVE_OR_NAN: Prices or numeric fields are NaN, Infinite, or Negative.
signals.TIME_TRAVEL: Timestamps are in the future or significantly out of order.

actions.SHADOW: Log anomaly, tag artifact with 'immune_flags', write to immune_ledger, DO NOT BLOCK.
actions.ENFORCE: Reject payload, halt pipeline, quarantine input (DISABLED IN V1).
